Sponsor Signature Submit Thank you for your application. It has been sent. × There was an error trying to send your application. Please try again later. × Close Directions × Here Is How To Get To Us By Car From downtown Clearwater follow the signs to the beach (SR60). Once on the beach turn left onto Gulfview Blvd and make a left turn onto South Bayway Blvd. You may also print a map and get detailed driving directions from your location. By Boat If approaching from the Gulf of Mexico, enter Clearwater Harbor through the Clearwater Pass. Proceed under the fixed span Clearwater Pass Bridge (74 feet vertical clearance), turn to port at marker #10. Proceed to markers #2 and #3 at Clearwater Point and follow that channel to marker #7. Turn to port and keep the small private markers #1 and #3 close aboard on your port side. Proceed heading west directly to the Yacht Club. If approaching from the Intracoastal, turn west at marker #12. Follow that channel to marker #2 at Clearwater Point, turn north, and proceed as above. Our Dockmaster monitors VHF channel 16 (working channel 71) from 0900 to 1600 Tuesday through Sunday and will be happy to assist you. Heading out the pass? Be careful, especially at low tide. A large shoal has formed across the entrance to Clearwater Point Channel, between markers No. 2 and No. 3. View the aerial photo below. Please note this photo is not to be used for navigation. Close Our next Event Waterside Meeting September 11 @ 5:30 pm - 6:30 pm Get in touch fast Quick Enquiry Simply select what you would like to do, and fill out the correct form. About us | Clear Water Club top of page Log In Start Mission FAQ Voices Shop Contact Impressum Privacy More Use tab to navigate through the menu items. Meet the Team Dreamers. Believers. Achievers. Clear Water Club is the digital meeting place for health-conscious people. And it was precisely these kinds of people who started the project. We have always been fascinated by topics such as sport, nutrition and regeneration. However, we soon agreed that the biggest lever for health is the water we drink. And that's exactly how we came up with the idea of setting up this website. The focus was always just one thing: Your health! ​ As you can imagine, when we founded this enterprise we were diving into uncharted territory with no expectations at all. What we had was an idea worth exploring. We strongly believe in the objective of this project and signed-up for the mission to educate and distribute our knowledge far and wide. This website was made for that purpose. Building a strong community around "water-awareness" and developing a solid understanding of the benefits of distilled water for human health and longevity, those were (and still are) our main goals. Since then we are getting a little closer to becoming the "go-to-website" for everything water- and health-related every day. This is our ask, this will be our mission - and a big first step towards something bigger? Time will tell! We are glad to have you on board. Thank you for walking this path with us! If you ever have a question, please don't hesitate to get in contact. Looking forward to hearing from you soon! Founder & CEO Marc marc@cwc.com 123-456-7890 COO & Head of Strategy Katharina katharina@cwc.com 123-456-7890 Design & Photography Juri juri@cwc.com 123-456-7890 Marketing & Advertisement Max max@cwc.com 123-456-7890 Media Management Ranya ranya@cwc.com 123-456-7890 Technical Development Stephan stefan@cwc.com 123-456-7890 ©2023 von Clear Water Club. bottom of page

& Country Club is committed to promoting the development of sports in Hong Kong and to providing greater access to the Club’s facilities by the following approved outside bodies: Any schools registered under the Education Ordinance (Cap. 279) Full List Here Any non-governmental organisations that is receiving recurrent subvention from the Social Welfare Department Full List Here Any “National Sports Association” which is affiliated to its respective International Federation and is a member of the Sports Federation & Olympic Committee of Hong Kong, China Full List Here Any uniformed groups and youth organisations that is receiving recurrent subvention from the Home Affairs Bureau Full List Here Any Government Departments Full List Here For enquiries, please contact Ms Fanita Tam, Senior Member Relations / Spa & Wellness Manager 2335 3788 fanitatam@cwbgolf.org For Academy Course bookings and/or further information please click Here 2335 3878 sr@cwbgolf.org Academy Course Enrolment requirements Visitors that have prior Golf Experience (no handicap required) are welcome to book and play on the Academy Course on all weekdays (except Hong Kong Public Holidays) with tee-off times available from 8:00am to 5:00pm. Please note the Academy Course is closed for regular maintenance every Tuesday morning and reopens at midday. Green-Fees for Local and Overseas Visitors 6-holes HK$500 12-holes HK$600 18-holes HK$700 Golf Carts Fees for Local and Overseas Visitors 6-holes HK$70 per Golf Cart 12-holes HK$110 per Golf Cart 18-holes HK$150 per Golf Cart Rental Golf Equipment Club HK$50 per Club Contact Us Name Email Subject Select... We use cookies on our site and collect other information pursuant to our Privacy Policy. By continuing to use our site, you consent to our Privacy Policy and data collection practices. OK Skip to Content Opens in new tab Member Login Benefits Finder Opens in new tab Careers Countryside Country Club Main Site Navigation Who We Are Amenities Golf Membership Host An Event Join Now Host Event Login - Opens in new tab Menu Who We Are Our Team Calendar Directions & Hours Amenities Dining Tennis Meet Our Tennis Staff Swimming Fitness Spa Kid Zone Camps Golf Bayhead Course Lake Course Pine Course Membership Host An Event Weddings Events Meetings & Corporate Event Rooms Tournaments & Outings Contact Us Opens in new tab Member Login Benefits Finder Opens in new tab Careers Home Gary Player Design Since the early 1980’s, Gary Player Design has been a global leader in golf course design with more than 135 courses completed worldwide. The business’s mission is founded on the principles of the man, Gary Player, who has always maintained that quality and professionalism are not negotiable. As a course designer, Gary Player and Gary Player Design are always steadfast in their ambition to create beauty and harmony and a playable golf course that honors the average member. Golf Play 27 holes of world-class championship golf re-designed exclusively by Gary Player and enjoy spectacular putting greens, a driving range and a fully equipped golf Pro Shop. The beautiful course features a striking and picturesque landscape that varies in challenge for players of every age and skill. With cutting-edge draining technology, golf at Countryside is largely unaffected by Florida's seasonal storms. Come play! Explore Golf Membership Discover all the many benefits of life at Countryside, including nationwide access to premier private clubs. Explore Membership Link opens in new page View Our Membership Brochure Dining Enjoy our talented culinary experts' vast selection of mouthwatering dishes, including American classics and bold seasonal specialties. Here, we're always cooking up something delicious. Explore Dining Fitness Look good, feel better and stay healthy in our state-of-the-art fitness center and spa, conveniently located on site. Explore Fitness Tennis Perfect your server at one of out 14 lighted outdoor courts and one of the finest tennis programs in all of Clearwater. Explore Tennis Host an Event Guaranteed to make your next wedding or event unforgettable, our gorgeous private venues are run by our professional service staff. Find a Venue Cross Bay & Cross Bay Premier Benefits If you're looking to enhance your membership with some exciting local club perks, this offers incredible value. With the Cross Bay benefits, you'll have the opportunity to relish golf access at discounted cart fees and enjoy reduced guest fees at not just two extra country clubs (Cross Bay) but THREE extra clubs (Cross Bay Premier) within the Tampa Bay region. Furthermore, you'll receive a 25% discount on food and beverage purchases at the additional clubs as well as your home club. Additionally, you can take advantage of special pricing for booking private events. Membership Team Matthew McCracken Membership Director Contact Me 727-350-1176 Contact Me About Matthew + Close Matthew McCracken information modal Matthew McCracken Membership Director Serving since 2022 727-350-1176 Matthew.McCracken 727-350-1176 Matthew.McCracken Contact Me About Matthew Matt brings over 15 years of sales and relationship management experience. Matt began his hospitality journey within the restaurant industry. His Iowa City restaurant was voted most romantic both years he was there. After meeting his wife Ruhee, he started a family with Mason and Maverik. Matt transitioned to banking for a leading Fortune 50. He was labeled the top finance sales producer within the consumer lending division before departing to Florida. Prior to Matt taking over the Membership Director role at Countryside, he championed the payments industry helping local neighbors save time and money. Within 3 years he was helping to facilitate over $75MM in transaction volume while monitoring over 1MM transactions annually. McCracken also finds the time to give back, donating his time and money to Wounded Warrior Project, Folds of Honor, 22 Until Valhalla and numerous groups helping our veterans, military and first responders. Contact Me Ashley Hauser Member Experience Director Contact Me 727-796-2153 Contact Me About Ashley + Close Ashley Hauser information modal Ashley Hauser Member Experience Director Serving since 2015 727-796-2153 Ashley.Hauser 727-796-2153 Ashley.Hauser Contact Me About Ashley Ashley joined the Countryside team in November 2015. Ashley was previously Countryside's Children's / Fitness Program Coordinator and is now serving as our Member Experience Director. Ashley obtained a B.A.S degree in Management and Organizational Leadership from St. Petersburg College.  In her spare time, Ashley enjoys spending time with family, friends and going to Universal. Ashley enjoys planning events and is excited to create unforgettable experiences for our Members here at Countryside! Contact Me Andy Bianchi General Manager Contact Me 727-796-2153 Contact Me About Andy + Close Andy Bianchi information modal Andy Bianchi General Manager Serving since 2010 727-796-2153 Andy.Bianchi 727-796-2153 Andy.Bianchi Contact Me About Andy Originally from Rome, Italy, he came to study English as a second language in 1996 in Miami, Florida. After 3 months of super-intensive courses, he attended Florida International University where he graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Hospitality Management. Andy worked for Intercontinental Hotels, Sofitel, Bentley Luxury Suites hotel in Miami Beach, Crown Golf and Invited for the last 10 years. Andy is fluent in Italian, Spanish and French and he is a certified pool operator. He is passionate about sports in general and considers his job a privilege. "You know it is not your typical 9-5 job when your office is surrounded by tennis courts, a pool, a gym and 80 children screaming and playing. Having worked in the past for big hotel chains where customers go and come daily, I really enjoy building long-lasting relationships and enriching member's lives as well as my own!" Contact Me Member Benefits Beyond the Club Our Members have access to the industry-leading Invited Network of more than 300 country clubs and business clubs nationwide. Plus, special offerings at more than 1,000 hotels, resorts and entertainment venues. Learn More Close Contact form for technical problems modal Contact form for technical problems. We use cookies on our site and collect other information pursuant to our Privacy Policy. By continuing to use our site, you consent to our Privacy Policy and data collection practices. OK Skip to Content Opens in new tab Member Login Benefits Finder Opens in new tab Careers Countryside Country Club Main Site Navigation Who We Are Amenities Golf Membership Host An Event Join Now Host Event Login - Opens in new tab Menu Who We Are Our Team Calendar Directions & Hours Amenities Dining Tennis Meet Our Tennis Staff Swimming Fitness Spa Kid Zone Camps Golf Bayhead Course Lake Course Pine Course Membership Host An Event Weddings Events Meetings & Corporate Event Rooms Tournaments & Outings Contact Us Opens in new tab Member Login Benefits Finder Opens in new tab Careers Home Who We Are Skip Image Carousel Discover the Countryside Difference The Countryside experience starts with you. We proudly offer programs, lessons, leagues and teams across all sports and all levels, including youth. Our beautiful clubhouse includes men’s and ladies’ locker rooms, a pro shop and casual and fine dining options. Whatever brings you life, you'll find the best of it right here. Our Team Calendar Directions & Hours A Warm, Welcoming Oasis Where Friends and Family Come Together Welcome! Here you'll discover the ultimate upscale home away from home just for you, where families come together, where friends become like family and where you create those special moments you will cherish forever. You'll find diverse golfing and tennis facilities featuring 27 holes of golf and 14 tennis courts. When you add a state-of-the-art fitness center, spa facilities, great dining, an attentive private events department, children's programming, two pools and a newly renovated bar and dining room, it's easy to see why we're the ideal Club to bring your luxe living dreams to life. Schedule A Tour A Friendly, Relaxed Environment For Friends & Family Countryside Country Club is dedicated to providing a home away from home for the family while creating those special moments you will cherish forever. At our Club, you'll find diverse golfing and tennis facilities, featuring 27 holes of golf and 14 tennis courts. When you add a state-of-the-art fitness center, spa facilities, great dining, an attentive private events department, programming for children, two pools and a newly renovated bar and dining room, it's easy to see why we're the ideal Club for your family and business needs. With versatility in both recreational amenities and special programs, Countryside Country Club appeals to a variety of Members of all ages. It’s the perfect place for families, friends, and business associates to come together and enjoy leisure time activities. Club Events Whether you're part of an active family or you're a busy professional with a passion for sports and social activities, we provide facilities and features to meet all your needs. With exceptional programming, business and social events, Members build lifelong relationships and develop a network of connections that lead to personal fulfillment and invaluable family memories. Tournaments - Join your fellow Members for fun and competitive Club-hosted tournaments. This is Club spirit at its finest. Networking - Build your network of business and social connections at our special Member events. Our Members include local professionals, civic and community leaders and other influential people to enhance your circle of friends. Kids & Family - We offer programs for kids of all ages and their families. From sports teams and leagues to special dining events and fun activities, we have something for every member of your family. Enriching Programs - Our programs are designed to enrich your life with cultural, educational and business-oriented events to match your interests. Enjoy guest speakers, professional seminars and special Member clubs and events. Holidays - We enjoy celebrating holidays at the Club. Watch our calendar for special traditions and events, as well as holiday dining features. We're also ready to help you host the perfect party with catering for any occasion.
